page.title: 18RADFORD
page.content: Radford is a nice place to live. There are lots of things for children instead of everything for adults. I go to a{Karate}club every Tuesday. It is great fun for people who are interested. Nearly everywhere you go there are{parks}but there are{clubs} etc. for adults. There are also a lot of industries. In Radford there are lots of famous{industries.} Every day I go outside to play. Most of the time I cannot play with my friends because they live in the new houses near school. The best thing to play is{'dobby'}on the 'monkey climber' in the park. We have a {Leisure Centre}built near our school - we go there every Monday for swimming. I am doing my Level 1 Swimming Test. I think the Leisure Centre is great but it would be better if it had diving boards. I think Radford is great!
